page.title: 10CLOTHES
page.content: FASHION IS ALWAYS CHANGING. IN OUR AREA THERE ARE A LOT OF ELDERLY PEOPLE SO THERE IS A BIG DIFFERENCE IN THE TYPES AND STYLES OF CLOTHES WORN BY THE ELDERLY,MIDDLE AGED AND YOUNG. OLD MEN WEAR SUITS WITH TIES AND OFTEN WEAR A HAT. OLD WOMEN TEND TO WEAR KNEE LENGTH DRESSES WITH FLORAL PATTERS ON THEM. THEY ALWAYS SEEM TO WEAR HATS. MIDDLE AGED MEN AND WOMEN APPEAR TO WEAR MORE CASUAL CLOTHES BUT STILL APPEAR SMARTLY DRESSED. YOUNG PEOPLE OFTEN WEAR TRENDY OR EVEN OUTRAGEOUS FASHIONS.CLOTHES ARE VERY BRIGHT IN COLOUR AND DO NOT APPEAR TO HAVE ANY REAL IDEA OF PLEASING THE EYE.SOME YOUNG PEOPLE DRESS TO BE EASILY IDENTIFIABLE IN A CROWD.OTHERS THINK IT IS GOOD FUN TO BE DIRTY AND UNTIDY.
